name: A Story (Remake Prototype)
description:
This is a test upload for a new game I'm working on, none of the current textures are final yet. I'll try to upload when I get major features created.

This version is only a showcase of camera angle and textures so, this will have no main menu.

If you have any tips for the game during this little prototype development phase, please leave a comment on this page. All suggestions used will be credited by the username connected to the comment.
